message.content: This question requires logical reasoning and understanding of the aging process. As people age, their physical features change. Option (A) is incorrect because the color of a person's eyes does not change with age. Option (B) is incorrect because baldness is typically associated with aging and can occur later in life. Option (C) is incorrect because gray hair is also associated with aging and can occur later in life. Option (D) is incorrect because wrinkled skin is a common sign of aging and can occur later in life. Therefore, the only correct answer is (A), as the old man would have had brown eyes when he was younger.
